hooks.command: echo 'CONTEXT COMPACTION IMMINENT. Before continuing: write a context dump to docs/notes.md covering what was done this session, what is next, any blockers, and the implementation plan for the next work item. Also update CLAUDE.md if architecture changed.'

echo 'Session starting. Do ALL of these before responding:
1. Read docs/notes.md (previous session context)
2. Read CLAUDE.md (architecture)
3. Run git log --oneline -20 (recent commits)
4. Summarize: phase, what is done, what is next, any risks.'
